item.description:
Join fellow Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a fun Friday Night Dinner @ Nino's Steak and Chop House in Hingham, one of the top voted Restaurants from the 2007 Restaurant Suggestion and Recommendation Discussion Thread!

Here is what some fellow diners had to say about Nino's on yelp.com.
Jim S. from Weymouth states: "I always thought this place was going to be fancy because of how nice the exterior looks. It's a nice place but very family oriented. The interior is very comfortable and all the stone work makes for a dramatic and old world feeling. The food is very average but you can count on it and that can be a good thing some nights. It seems like a good place to be a regular."
Amy R. from Hingham states: "I really enjoyed this place on a cold and rainy night. The interior, with the stone work and pitched roof reminds me of a church a bit....where I prayed to the Holy Balsamico Sirloin Steak (perfectly cooked too). Holy YUM for 18.50. I got a massive and perfectly cooked baked potato, a lovely assortment of beans, and washed it down with a large glass of Valpolicella. We also had the polenta with peppers and onions and sauce and it was AMAZING. I'd have gotten it as a starter though as there was just too much food to eat. I took home more than half my meal. My husband will be loving those leftovers today...or tomorrow! I am a big big fan of this place!"
To read more reviews go to yelp.com and type in "Nino's" in the Restaurant Search and "Hingham, MA" in the City Information.

Yelp states the approximate cost for one meal including drink, tax and tip is approximately $11-$30.

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dinner @ Nino's Steak and Chop House
Friday, August 29th, 2008 @ 6:45pm
415 Whiting Street
Route 53
Hingham, MA 02043
781-340-7300

Organizer(s): Angela
Min/Max: Min of 6 people 48 hours in advance. Max of 20 people.
Guests: 1 per Member
Fees: Annual Members and one Guest- FREE, Group Members - $2, Guests - $2
RSVP Deadline: 10AM on Friday, August 29th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer and will be considered a No-Show per our guidelines on the About Us page. (It's OK if you are a couple minutes late given that it's Labor Day weekend and we may have to wait a few minutes to be seated.)

Please Note: Annual Members are allowed to bring ONE GUEST FREE to this event.

Meeting Location: Outside the front door if it's nice out. We will then go in together as a Group. Otherwise, inside the Lobby. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Angela."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

From Rt 3: Exit 15 - Derby Street, Hingham. Follow Derby Street straight past the Derby Shoppes and take a Left at the 2nd light onto Cushing Street. Follow Cushing Street to the next light. Take a left onto Route 53N and pick-up form Route 53N below.

Heading South on Route 53: 1/4 mi south of the Weymouth line on the left.

Heading North on Route 53: 1/4 mi north of Linden Ponds on the right. (About 1.5 miles north of the light at the intersection of Cushing Street.)

Parking: In lot behind restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Front Door. Late arrivals should ask the host for "Angela."

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Night Dinner @ Nino's
